info.description:
Purpose: Perform Golden path end-to-end testing on a deployed Mojaloop system

Contributors:
- Mowali
- Amar Ramachandran <amarnath.ramachandran@modusbox.com>

- valentin genev <valentin.genev@modusbox.com>
- Vijay Guthi <vijaya.guthi@modusbox.com>
